Based on the execution logs and entity data, I'll create a comprehensive report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Complex
Located around (-15, -50), consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-15, -50) mining iron ore
- Storage chest at (-13.5, -50.5) collecting mined ore
- Burner inserter system connecting mining drill to storage and belt system
- Complex belt transport system leading to furnaces

### Smelting Facility
Located around (46, -80), includes:
- Two stone furnaces at (46, -80) and (51, -80)
- Multiple burner inserters for fuel and material handling
- Storage chest at (49.5, -79.5) containing iron plates and coal
- Automated coal and iron ore input system via belts and inserters

### Coal Mining Station
Located around (38, -83), contains:
- Burner mining drill at (38, -83) for coal extraction
- Storage chest at (39.5, -83.5) holding coal
- Currently inactive due to lack of fuel

### Storage System
Multiple wooden chests serving different purposes:
- Chest at (-8.5, -52.5) storing transport belts
- Chest at (-6.5, -52.5) holding iron ore
- Various intermediate storage chests throughout the belt network

ERROR TIPS

### Belt Connection Issues
- Ensure proper belt orientation and connections before attempting to rebuild sections
- Verify inventory has required items before attempting belt construction
- Clear blocked belts before attempting to place new ones in the same location

### Resource Management
- Monitor inventory capacity before attempting large-scale construction
- Ensure proper fuel distribution to all burner entities
- Clear full storage containers regularly to prevent blockages

### Entity Placement
- Verify space availability before placing new entities
- Ensure connected entities are properly aligned and oriented
- Check for existing infrastructure before attempting to place new structures

NAMESPACE

### Variables
- transport_belt: EntityType
- burner_inserter: EntityType
- wooden_chest: EntityType
- stone_furnace: EntityType
- burner_mining_drill: EntityType

### Functions
- adjust_smelting_connection(): Connects storage to furnace belt system
- optimize_belt_flow(): Corrects belt directions and verifies material flow
- rebuild_belt_connection(): Reconstructs belt pathways between components
- clear_inventory(): Manages inventory overflow through storage systems
